title: Number of immigrants in Singapore 2005 to 2019
summary: As of 2019 , 1711.0 thousand Italians were living in Singapore .
Between 2015 and , the Number of immigrants thousands who lived in Singapore constantly increased .
However , in 2010 and in 2019 the immigrants of Singapore experienced a decrease .
gold: In 2019 , there were about 2.16 million immigrants ( here classified as people living in a country in which they were not born in ) in Singapore out of a total population of about 5.7 million.
Immigrants made up a significant share of the population and play a crucial role in Singapore , where the birth rate was among the lowest in the world.
Singapore 's immigrant population The immigrant population of Singapore made up slightly more than 40 percent of the total population of the country in 2018 .
